ygData.subject: Tinkering, increasing lvl quickly....?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am new to the Tinkering trade, I have a lvl 35 Necro Gnome, but hadnt begun considering tinkering until the new underwater breathing device and Gemcutter (my
ygData.messageBody:
I am new to the Tinkering trade,
I have a lvl 35 Necro Gnome, but hadnt begun considering tinkering
until the new underwater breathing device and Gemcutter (my alt is a master
jeweler with maxed skill). Anyhow, I am wondering what the easiest way to
increase skill in Tinkering is. Can anyone post a list somewhat like the
following:

Skill 50-58 Animated Bait: Combine X + Y +Z
Skill 59-70 Etc
Skill etc Etc, etc

I really have no clue how to start out on this tinkering, and would
appreciate someones knowledgeable advice!!!

Maledicta Soulstealer
Necro Gnome
35 th Level
Bertoxxulous
